other_tests.findings: ST-segment elevation in the inferior leads, consistent with acute inferior myocardial infarction, and third-degree atrioventricular block.
85% stenosis of the proximal right coronary artery and 70% stenosis of the middle segment. Normal left ventricular contraction with an ejection fraction of 0.73.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased thickening of aortic-valve and mitral-valve leaflets over time, with mild insufficiency.

other_tests.findings: Forced expiratory volume in 1 second was 36% of the predicted value, vital capacity 48%, total lung capacity 64%, and carbon monoxide diffusing capacity 67%.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Gradual decrease in pulmonary function over time.

other_tests.findings: Severe esophageal dysmotility, with spontaneous reflux of barium up to the clavicles.
ST-segment elevation consistent with myocardial infarction and bradycardic cardiac arrest.
